sen.j: のっぺ は日本の郷土料理のひとつ。
sen.e: Noppe is a Japanese local dish.
Noppe is a Japanese local dish.
Noppe is a Japanese local dish.

sen.j: サトイモを主とし、鶏肉、ニンジン、ゴボウ、油揚げ、イクラ、貝柱、キノコ等を加えた煮物。
sen.e: It is a nimono (stewed foods simmered in a soy-and-sake-based sauce) made of mainly taro, and chicken, carrot, burdock, deep-fried bean curd, salmon roe, scallop, mushroom, and so on.
It is a nimono (stewed foods simmered in a soy-and-sake-based sauce) made of mainly taro, and chicken, carrot, burdock, deep-fried bean curd, salmon roe, scallop, mushroom, and so on.
It is a nimono (stewed foods simmered in a soy-and-sake-based sauce) made of mainly taro, and chicken, carrot, burdock, deep-fried bean curd, salmon roe, scallop, mushroom, and so on.

sen.j: 冷たい状態で食べるが、温めてもよい。
sen.e: Usually it is served cold, however, the warm one is also delicious.
Usually it is served cold, but the warm one is also delicious.
Usually it is served cold, but the warm one is also delicious.

sen.j: 新潟県や奈良県のものが有名である。
sen.e: The noppe of Nigata Prefecture and of Nara Prefecture are famous.
The noppe of Nigata Prefecture and of Nara Prefecture are famous.
The noppe of Nigata Prefecture and of Nara Prefecture are famous.

sen.j: サトイモによって「とろみ」が自然につくため、片栗粉やデンプンは必須ではない。
sen.e: The soup is thickened with taro, so it doesn't need starch.
The soup is thickened with taro, so it doesn't need starch.
The soup is thickened with taro, so it doesn't need starch.
Noppei-jiru' (noppei soup) is a different dish.
Noppei-jiru' (noppei soup) is a different dish.
Noppei-jiru' (noppei soup) is a different dish.
